title: [娱乐|机制|附属|其他]SlimefunSubsidiary——粘液科技多种附属插件你值得拥有[1.8+]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 10:18 编辑 


插件介绍【没写完,累死我喽,给点人气呗】粘液科技不够疯狂？这里有22种粘液科技附属插件！别装魔法物品！会生成废墟，里面的东西特强。异国花园[超长]点我去官方点我直接官方下载下方有站内下载[汉化过的老版本]作者原话：
Exotic Garden is a Slimefun Addon which generates new Plants all over your World.It includes several new Fruits as well as their trees and new Berries and Berry Bushes.But of course it also adds a couple new Food Sources to the game. For every Berry there is also a Juice,a Smoothie and a Pie available.However there are only some Fruits which also come with their Juice and Pies.And if you dont happen to be lucky and find a Bush/Tree
in the world, you can also obtain them by breaking tall grass.

This Plugin was heavily inspired by the famous Pam's HarvestCraft Mod by MatrexsVigil
and the famous Magical Crops Mod by Mark719

翻译：【英语渣】[翻译错误请指出]：

异国花园：异国情调的花园是一个slimefun插件，在你们世界各地产生新的植物。它包括一些新的水果以及他们的树，新浆果和矿物浆果。当然，它也增加了一些新的食物来源。对于这个游戏。每个水果都有果汁，一些水果可以做成饮料，馅饼。如果你是幸运的，你也能在地图上找到布什树，通过打掉它们获得高草。这个插件的创作灵感来源于著名的PAM的harvestcraft MOD的matrexsvigil和著名的神奇作物的mark719 MOD。Source Code源码
You want to take over this Project? Start so by submitting Pull Requests on GitHub!【如果你想接手这个项目，请提交请求在GitHub上！】
 
Check out Exotic Garden's Source Code, if you want to keep this Project alive, maybe even consider contributing to it by making a Pull Request!【查看异国花园的源代码，如果你想这个项目长久发展，可以考虑作出贡献！】List of new Items【新增物品列表】Trees[树]Apple Oak TreeCoconut PalmPomegranate TreeCherry TreeLemon TreePlum TreeLime TreeOrange TreeBushes[灌木丛]
Raspberry BushBlueberry BushCranberry BushBlackberry BushGrape BushElderberry BushCowberry BushPlants[植物]
Strawberry PlantTomato PlantCorn PlantLettuce PlantTea Leaf PlantCabbage PlantSweet Potato PlantMustard Seed PlantFood[食物]
JuicesSmoothiesCoconut MilkWineVarious Iced Tea flavoursThai TeaSweetened TeaPiesJelly SandwichesPumpkin BreadPotato SaladChicken SandwichFish SandwichEgg SaladTomato SoupStrawberry SaladGrape SaladCheesecakeCherry CheesecakeBlueberry CheesecakeBiscuitBlackberry CobblerPavlovaCorn on the CobCreamed CornSandwichBLTLeafy Chicken SandwichLeafy Fish SandwichHamburgerCheeseburgerBacon CheeseburgerDeluxe CheeseburgerCarrot CakeJammy DodgerBaconChickenburgerChicken CheeseburgerBacon BurgerBacon SandwichTacoFish TacoPancakesBlueberry PancakesFriesPopcornShepard's PieChicken Pot PieChocolate CakeCream CookieBlueberry MuffinChocolate Chip MuffinChocolate BarBoston Cream PieHot DogBacon wrapped Cheese filled Hot DogPumpkin CheesecakePumpkin MuffinLamingtonWafflesSweet Potato PieHot ChocolateSweetened TeaLemonadeClub SandwichBurritoChicken BurritoGrilled SandwichAnd much more[太多了写不下]Magical Plants[神奇的植物-矿物植物]
Coal PlantIronPlantGold PlantRedstone PlantLapis PlantSlime PlantEnder PlantGlowstone PlantObsidian PlantDiamond PlantEmerald PlantQuartz PlantMisc[杂项]
CrookGrass SeedsMayoCornmealMustardBBQ Sauce
IMPORTANT: Since 1.8 Player Heads render in your Inventory, therefore 
ExoticGarden provides the ability for all the Dishes and Fruits to be displayed
using a custom Texture.
http://dev.bukkit.org/media/imag ... c02321002d7270c.png
However if this somehow does not seem to work or you are using 1.7 (or below),
you can simply disable that Feature by setting options: item-heads to false in
your ExoticGarden config.yml

You have a Texture for a new/existing Item in ExoticGarden, feel free to send me the .png File via my contact Page and I will gladly consider implementing it
[以上内容个人能力有限“好吧，是太懒”如果您愿意奉献，请在下面的楼层中翻译这段文字，谢谢！]
Also a huge thank you to AquaLazuryt for making most of the Textures you can see in this Plugin【你在ExoticGarden有一个新的有关这个插件的头颅雕理，随时给我。PNG文件通过我联系Page，我将考虑使用它，也谢谢你的贡献。】电力工艺点我去官方官方下载This project is abandoned and its default file will likely not work with the most recent version of Minecraft. Whether this project is out of date or its author has marked it as abandoned, this project is no longer maintained.【貌似是作者弃坑的意思】

Description
Electric Spawners is a Slimefun Addon which allows you to
turn your Reinforced Spawners from Slimefun into a
Powered Spawner.
Powered Spawners
a) do NOT require a Player nearby
b) spawn Entities much faster than normal Spawners
c) require Energy (see Slimefun's Wiki for a Tutorial on how to create an Energy Network)
d) do not spawn any Mob if there are more than 6 Mobs of that Type around already

This Plugin also comes with the Special Wither Skeleton Spawner.
However note that Powered Spawners are quite expensive as they
require Blistering Ingots and Plutonium from Slimefun to craft. 
Requires CS-CoreLib and Slimefun 4+ to be installed!Screenshot
Commands/Permissions
There are no Commands/PermissionsAuto-Updater
All my Plugins are using an Auto-Updater to make sure, you're always
using the latest and hopefully most bug free version of my Plugin.
If you don't want this Plugin to be auto-updated, you can turn it off
in the config file at "options -> auto-update: true/false"Frequently Asked Questions
                            时间不够不做翻译，希望坛友们可以帮我的忙，谢谢！                                 更多颜色的末影箱This project is abandoned and its default file will likely not work with the most recent version of Minecraft. Whether this project is out of date or its author has marked it as abandoned, this project is no longer maintained.【貌似作者已经弃坑】                                                        官方   官方下载
Description
Colored Ender Chest is a Slimefun Addon which adds
Frequency-based Ender Chests to the Game that sync
between all Players and Worlds.
Colored Ender Chests have 3 Colors each, allowing for
a total of 4096 possible Color Combinations.
And since all Ender Chests come with a small and big variant,
you can get a total of 8192 different Ender Chests.

These Ender Chests also support Slimefun 4's Cargo System,
so you can even move Items from/to Colored Ender Chests.

BIG WARNING:
This Plugin adds up to 8192 new Slimefun Items, in case you are using MagicLoot or you were going to disable these Ender Chests in a certain World, you should be warned that disabling 8192 Items can be extremely time-consuming.
Requires CS-CoreLib and Slimefun 4+ to be installed!Screenshot
Commands/Permissions
There are no Commands/PermissionsAuto-Updater
All my Plugins are using an Auto-Updater to make sure, you're always
using the latest and hopefully most bug free version of my Plugin.
If you don't want this Plugin to be auto-updated, you can turn it off
in the config file at "options -> auto-update: true/false"

                            时间不够不做翻译，希望坛友们可以帮我的忙，谢谢！                                  幸运方块官方官方下载原文：Lucky Blocks (Slimefun Edition) is a Slimefun Addon which adds the popular Lucky Blocks Mod to your Bukkit Server.There are various random Events available which can occur when breaking Lucky Blocks as well as the craftable "Very lucky" and "Very unlucky" Lucky Blocks.This Plugin also features a built-in Generator for LuckyBlocks to spawn randomly in your World.In order to show the LuckyBlock's Texture in your Inventory, it is highly recommended that you are using 1.8+
If you have any Suggestions regarding new Occurances for Lucky Blocks, do not hesitate to make a suggestion using the Contact Page翻译：幸运方块（slimefun版）是一slimefun插件的附属插件，十分流行。打掉幸运方块会有各种各样的随机事件。而且可以自己制作“非常幸运”和“非常不幸”幸运方块。这个插件还会随机在世界生成幸运方块。它支持1.8+[1.8版本以上均可使用]如果你有关于幸运块新发生的任何建议，不要犹豫，使用接触网页提出建议个人评价：不推荐使用，幸运方块获得的物品实在太强了。时运10-锋利10-保护10+各种10导致我服提前周目，自己酌情添加                                           额外物品官方官方下载

Description
ExtraGear is a Slimefun Addon requested by Doomlordviz.
This Addon simply adds new Swords with different Enchantments
for every new Metal Slimefun adds. From Copper to Cobalt.
There is not much to explain here as this is everything it does at the moment.
But there will come more like Armor for different Metals or Pickaxes etc...
Feel free to leave suggestions down in the comments. 描述ExtraGear额外物品是slimefun粘液科技的附属插件。这个插件添加新的剑以及不同的资源，为slimefun增加了不同的矿物，从铜到钴。这里没有什么可以解释的，因为这就是它现在所做的一切。但会有更多的像盔甲不同金属或稿子等。请随意在评论中留下建议。[size=14.44444465637207px]快捷宠物[size=14.44444465637207px]官方官方下载[size=14.44444465637207px]HotbarPets is a Slimefun Addon giving you the chance to
have Pets you can carry around in your Hotbar.
All pets have a certain "Special Ability" such as Fire Resistance,
Saturation or even Regeneration.
But be careful: If you don't feed your Pets, they will get upset!

Now, you might be thinking: Oh, this sounds similiar to InventoryPets?
Indeed, this Plugin is heavily inspired by the famous Mod InventoryPets by Purplicious_Cow
(That is also the Reason why there is a Purplicious Cow Pet ;D )

Pets can also varie from normal Minecraft Animals up to
Hostile Minecraft Mobs and even "special" Pets referring to
some people on the Internet.hotbarpets快捷宠物是slimefun附属插件。宠物，你可以随身携带宠物在快捷栏。所有宠物都有一定的“特殊能力”如防火，饱和甚至再生。但要小心：如果你不喂你的宠物，他们会很生气的！现在，你可能会想：哦，这听起来像inventorypets？事实上，这个插件是灵感来自于著名的MOD inventorypets purplicious_cow（这也是为什么有一个purplicious牛宠物；D）宠物也可以从正常到Minecraft的动物品种敌对的Minecraft暴民甚至“特殊”宠物指互联网上的一些人。[size=14.44444465637207px][size=14.44444465637207px]私人仓库[url=https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/privatestorage]官方[/url]官方下载Description
This Plugin is a Slimefun Addon which adds a private Chest to the Game as well as a magical Lock.
This private Chest also comes with 5 different Tiers! (2x9, 3x9, 4x9, 5x9 and 6x9)
and 2 explosion withstanding Tiers (4x9 and 5x9)
but it also adds regular Chests with these Attributes.
Each Tier has its own Texture.
The private Safe can only be opened or broken by the Creator of it.All Crafting Recipes can be seen in the Slimefun Guide

If you are using CompactForcefields, there are also Community Chests (Chests that can only be opened by Members of your Forcefield)

Updating from PrivateStorage 2 -> 3?
Sorry, but all your Safes/Chests will no longer work on PrivateStorage 3.
You sadly cannot keep your data.Commands
Since this is a Slimefun addon, you can spawn the Items in using /sf cheat
But PrivateStorage does not add its own Commands...
Permissions Permission Description  PrivateStorage.bypass Allows to open and modify other's Safes Donations

Auto-Updater
All my Plugins are using an Auto-Updater to make sure, you're always
using the latest and hopefully most bug free version of my Plugin.
If you don't want this Plugin to be auto-updated, you can turn it off
in the config file at "options -> auto-update: true/false"Frequently Asked Questions
Click to go to the FAQ太长了。就是说这是一个安全的保护玩家物品的粘液科技附属插件。可以在粘液科技向导书里面找到专属界面桶官方[url=https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/slimefun-barrels/files/latest]官方下载[/url]Have you ever had that feeling, where you have way too much stuff of the same type and too little space to store it in a Slimefun server? Well, this plugin is just for you!You can also interact with the barrels, using Slimefun's Cargo Network.Barrels allow you to store an item of the same type in bulk quantities, in only one block. There currently are 5 sizes, listed below:Small - 64 StacksMedium - 128 StacksBig - 256 StacksLarge 512 StacksDeep Storage Unit - 16384 Stacks
Modules/upgradesThe following modules can be installed into Barrels, to enhance them.Explosion Module - Prevents the barrel from getting broken from explosions.Biometric Module - Prevents other people from accessing a Barrel. To add somebody to the barrels' whitelist, simply right click the barrel with a bound ID Card to the person to be added.Structural Upgrade I - Adds 8192 more capacity to a barrel.Strucutral Upgrade II - Adds 16384 more capacity to a barrel.Structural Upgrade III - Adds 32768 more capacity to a barrel.
CS-CoreLib and Slimefun v.4.1.5+ must be installed for this plugin to work!A preview of a barrel can be seen here:ConfigAn example of the config can be seen here:options:  auto-update: true //Disable this if you do not want the plugin to get auto updated.  displayItem: true //Disable this if you do not want a display item on top of the barrels.  plastic-recipe: true //Disable this if you want a cauldron to be used instead of plastic in the barrel's recipe.

Auto-Updater and MetricsAll my Plugins are using an Auto-Updater to make sure, you're always using the latest and hopefully most bug free version of my Plugin. If you don't want this Plugin to be auto-updated, you can turn it off in the config file at "options -> auto-update: true/false"They also use a Metrics-System which collects the following Information:A unique identifierThe server's version of JavaWhether the server is in offline or online modeThe plugin's versionThe server's versionThe OS version/name and architectureThe core count for the CPUThe number of players onlineThe Metrics versionOpting out of this service can be done by editing plugins/Plugin Metrics/config.yml and changing opt-out to true.
头颅工艺[url=https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/extraheads]官方[/url]官方下载作者已弃坑Description
ExtraHeads is a Slimefun Addon which adds new Mob Heads to Minecraft.
When killing certain Mobs, you have a chance to get their Head,
further on this Page you will find a list of all Mobs/Heads added by ExtraHeads.

You can disable any Head under
/plugins/Slimefun/Items.yml
and change the Drop Rates under
/plugins/ExtraHeads/config.yml

That is pretty much everything about this Plugin.

Requires CS-CoreLib and Slimefun to be installed!Mobs/Heads
There are no Commands/PermissionsBlazeCave SpiderGhastZombie PigmanEndermanMagma CubeSlimeSpiderChickenPigCowSquidVillagerIron GolemMushroom CowOcelotHorseGuardianWitherEnder DragonWitchRabbit
Commands/Permissions
There are no Commands/Permissions我的介绍：这款插件可以使生物死亡后掉落头颅                                                                你能在这里禁用掉落头颅或者更改掉落的概率
/plugins/ExtraHeads/config.yml
绿宝石附魔[url=https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/emerald-enchants]官方[/url]官方下载Description
EmeraldEnchants 2 is a Plugin that allows you to have custom Enchantments.
You can find a List of all available Enchantments by using /ee guide
These Enchantments cannot (yet) be obtained in Survival.
But you can give them to Players using PrisonGems
or MagicLoot v3.0+ (Not yet released)

EmeraldEnchants also hooks into Slimefun and adds a new Category to your
Slimefun Guide listing all available Enchantments from EmeraldEnchants.
You can also add/remove Enchantments from EmeraldEnchants using Slimefun's
Auto Enchanter and Auto Disenchanter.

All Enchantments can be edited/disabled in your config.yml

To give you an idea of what kind of Enchantments are added, here
are a FEW examples of Enchantments EmeraldEnchants contains:ExplosiveVein MinerTimberIce AspectArrow ReflectorPoisonous ProtectionMagical ProtectionWither ProtectionMagnetic AuraAll Potion Effects And much, much more!
Commands Command Description  /ee Base Command  /ee guide Opens up the EE Enchantment Guide  /ee enchant <Enchantment> <Level> Applies an Enchantment to the Item you are holding  /ee list Lists all registered EE-Enchantments Permissions Permission Description  EmeraldEnchants.command.enchant Allows you to do /ee enchant  EmeraldEnchants.command.list Allows you to do /ee list Source Code

Check out EmeraldEnchants' Source Code, if you want to keep this Project alive, maybe even consider contributing to it by making a Pull Request!Test it out for yourself
Feeling like my description is not enough to show the potential of this Plugin?
Or just want to play a bit of Minecraft with me?
Feel free to visit my official Testing Server providing you the ability
to try a lot of my Plugins out yourself.
IP: cookiesrealm.mcnode.netDonations

Auto-Updater and Metrics
All my Plugins are using an Auto-Updater to make sure, you're always
using the latest and hopefully most bug free version of my Plugin.
If you don't want this Plugin to be auto-updated, you can turn it off
in the config file at "options -> auto-update: true/false"

They also use a Metrics-System which collects the following Informations:

A unique identifier
The server's version of Java
Whether the server is in offline or online mode
The plugin's version
The server's version
The OS version/name and architecture
The core count for the CPU
The number of players online
The Metrics version
Opting out of this service can be done by editing 
plugins/Plugin Metrics/config.yml and changing opt-out to true.废料官方[url=https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/slimescrap/files/latest]官方下载[/url]Did you ever wish, that you could deconstruct your useless machines and put those components in something useful? If you do, then this plugin is for you! Simple craft a Salvager and Right-Click it on any placed machine, it will magically disappear and drop the ingredients used to make it.CS-CoreLib and Slimefun must be installed for this plugin to work!Example Configoptions:  auto-update: true //Enable this if you want the plugin to be auto-updated.items:  ENHANCED_FURNACE: true //Disable this if you do not want this item to be salvageable.  CARBONADO_EDGED_CAPACITOR: true  SOLAR_GENERATOR: true  SOLAR_GENERATOR_2: true  SOLAR_GENERATOR_3: true  SOLAR_GENERATOR_4: true  CHARGING_BENCH: true  ELECTRIC_FURNACE: true

PermissionsThis plugin uses a very simple permission system. For example, say you want a player to be able to salvage a Solar Generator. Put in his permission node (or group) salvage.SOLAR_GENERATOR. If you want your players to be able to be able to salvage all the machines, simply put salvage.*Auto-Updater and MetricsAll my Plugins are using an Auto-Updater to make sure, you're always using the latest and hopefully the most bug-free version of my Plugin. If you don't want this Plugin to be auto-updated, you can turn it off in the config file at "options -> auto-update: true/false"They also use a Metrics-System which collects the following Information:A unique identifierThe server's version of JavaWhether the server is in offline or online modeThe plugin's versionThe server's versionThe OS version/name and architectureThe core count for the CPUThe number of players onlineThe Metrics versionOpting out of this service can be done by editing plugins/Plugin Metrics/config.yml and changing opt-out to true.
Credits for the idea go to Jabberwockie666Sensible Toolbox聪明的工具箱官方官方下载  


Sensible Toolbox adds a bunch of new items, tools, blocks, machines, an energy system, an item transfer system, plus a developer API to make it easy for other plugins to define their own items. It's heavily inspired by certain Forge-based mods, but of course requires no client modifications at all.Want to get started quickly? Read the Quickstart Guide!

| All Downloads |
Videos
A nice tutorial/review of v0.0.1 by MusicTechnician:Full list of videos here
Documentation
Installation and Quickstart GuideCommand ReferenceConfiguration FilePermissions SupportAccess Control and Block ProtectionItems and Blocks
Basic UtilitiesComponentsFarmingPaintingBuildingItem RoutingItem StorageEnder StorageEnergy SystemMachines (ore processing etc.)Unfinished/Not fully working items
Block and Inventory ProtectionDeveloper APICredits - Plugins/Mods/Authors to thank
Known Plugin Incompatibilities
MultiInv: if you're carrying any STB items when you switch inventories, those items will lose their data, since MultiInv doesn't currently preserve extended item attributes which STB uses to store item-specific information. The MultiInv author does plan to add attribute support so hopefully a newer version of MultiInv will resolve this in the future. For now the workaround is to store any STB items before you switch inventories.LWC: LWC is supported, but you must use a recent dev build of LWC with UUID support. Dev builds of LWC can be obtained from http://ci.griefcraft.com/job/LWC/. If you can't use a recent build, then you can disable LWC support: see Protection.WorldEdit, Movecraft or indeed any plugin which move regions of blocks around or directly clear regions without firing events: don't use them with any region which contains an STB block. The physical block will be moved or removed, but STB doesn't (can't) know that and will keep a record for the associated STB object in memory. This could lead to all sorts of problems.
Source Code
Auto-Updater and Metrics

All my Plugins are using an Auto-Updater to make sure, you're always
using the latest and hopefully most bug free version of my Plugin.
If you don't want this Plugin to be auto-updated, you can turn it off
in the config file at "options -> auto-update: true/false"

They also use a Metrics-System which collects the following Informations:

A unique identifier
The server's version of Java
Whether the server is in offline or online mode
The plugin's version
The server's version
The OS version/name and architecture
The core count for the CPU
The number of players online
The Metrics version
Opting out of this service can be done by editing 
plugins/Plugin Metrics/config.yml and changing opt-out to true.
Frequently Asked Questions

Click to go to the FAQ枪械工艺官方[url=https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/gun-fun/files/latest]官方下载[/url]Description
Gun Fun is a pretty simple Plugin. It adds Guns, that's it!
Well of course it also adds things like Grips, Flash Hiders, Sound Mufflers...
However, to use Gun Fun, you need to install Slimefun first.

You can easily create your own Guns in the Items.yml, here's a Tutorial how:Configuration
This File is located in /plugins/Slimefun/Items.yml123456789
GUN_SNIPER: ## You need to place the following inside a certain Type. Gun_SNIPER/GUN_PISTOL/...  guns:    '0': ## The ID, make sure you are not leaving a Gap, otherwise it'll not recognize your Gun      name: '&7M-200 Intervention' ## The Name of your Gun      ammo-capacity: 2 ## The Capacity. Note here that if your Capacity is 2, it has 2 Slots for Ammo. So a Capacity of 128.      damage: 20.0 ## The Damage your Gun does. Headshots double the Damage!      speed: 6.0 ## How fast the Bullet is      type: IRON_BARDING ## The Item which will be used for your Gun      clip-size: 1 ## How many Bullets your Gun can hold before it has to reload.

plugins/Plugin Metrics/config.yml and changing opt-out to true.魔法物品官方官方下载Description
MagicLoot adds a whole new RPG Experience to your Server!
This Plugin randomly generates ruins in the world. These ruins
have Chests in them which will also be randomly filled with Items
MagicLoot's Item System is very easy. You can specify in the Configs
which enchantments can be added, which items can be added
and even whether it should add random Potions or Slimefun Items
Screenshots


Customization
Item CustomizationAdditional Informations
MagicLoot is fully customizable and expandable. You can add your own Prefixes and Suffixes for the Names of all Items.
Most Items also have a lot of Enchantments. This even works for Mods! If you're f.e. playing with Thaumcraft, all Thaumcraft Enchantments may be applied on some MagicLoot Items.
If you're using Slimefun this Plugin will also spawn Slimefun's and all its addons' Items in some Loot Chests.
You can also configure the Effects Items/Potions can get as well as their Enchantments.
When you find Tools they will of course have a little bit of Damage already.
And if you find Leather Armor it will be dyed in a random color
Also Enchanted Books have been added! These will also come with configurable Enchantments.
Sometimes you also might find "unanalized" Items, if you get lucky and find a Tome of Analizing you can analize them to get cool Items.

The Effects on Items will either start with a +/- "+" means it applies to you, "-" means it applies to your enemy.
Commands and Permissions
There are no Commands and no permissions!

plugins/Plugin Metrics/config.yml and changing opt-out to true.更多物品官方[url=https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/slimexpansion_v1-0/files/latest]官方下载[/url]Are you getting bored of plain Slimefun? Do you wish there would be more stuff to do in it? If that's the case, then this plugin is for you! SlimeXpansion adds 30 additional items, from Wireless Chargers to Bedrock Breakers to make your gameplay more interesting! It allows you to automate a bunch more stuff, such as Ore Mining, which wasn't really possible before.CS-CoreLib and Slimefun must be installed for this plugin to work!DocumentationMachinesEquipment
Example Configoptions:  auto-update: true //Enable this if you want the plugin to be auto updated  lootable-scrapbox: true //Disable this if you do NOT want the Lootboxes to be lootable.scrapbox-items: //This list contains all items you can get by looting Scrapboxes. Feel free to add/remove items you want to. Vanilla and Slimefun items are supported.  - DIAMOND  - CAKE  - GOLD_ORE  - IRON_ORE  - SLIME_BALL  - COAL_ORE  - COOKED_BEEF  - REDSTONE  - GLOWSTONE_DUST  - COOKED_CHICKEN  - BONE  - FEATHER  - LEATHER  - SIGN  - SOUL_SAND  - BREAD  - APPLE  - MELON  - PUMPKIN  - NETHERRACK  - ROTTEN_FLESH  - GRAVEL  - STICK  - DIRT  - GRASS  - WOOD_HOE  - GOLD_HELMET  - IRON_DUST  - COPPER_DUST  - TIN_DUST  - GOLD_DUST  - BATTERY

Auto-Updater and MetricsAll my Plugins are using an Auto-Updater to make sure, you're always using the latest and hopefully the most bug-free version of my Plugin. If you don't want this Plugin to be auto-updated, you can turn it off in the config file at "options -> auto-update: true/false"They also use a Metrics-System which collects the following Information:A unique identifierThe server's version of JavaWhether the server is in offline or online modeThe plugin's versionThe server's versionThe OS version/name and architectureThe core count for the CPUThe number of players onlineThe Metrics versionOpting out of this service can be done by editing plugins/Plugin Metrics/config.yml and changing opt-out to true.
庇护所[url=https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/shelter]官方[/url][url=https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/shelter/files/latest]官方下载[/url]Description
Shelter is a slightly simple Slimefun Addon
which allows you to construct Huts or more like Houses
easier and faster than building it for yourself.
Its based on the Building construction from The Forest
and therefore might seem very similiar.
This Plugin also supports the Creation of your own "Shelters"
by simply putting a Schematic into plugins/Shelter/schematics
The Plugin will then automatically handle everything for your Building.
But of course those Buildings are not free!
You still need all the required Resources to make one.
First you need a Shelter blueprint, using this you can choose what Building you want to build.
When placing down a Shelter, it will first highlight the Area it wants to build in.
After that it will place down a Sign saying what Materials it needs and as
you supply the needed materials by right clicking
the Sign with the needed Material, it will slowly but surely place down your
Building.ScreenshotsConstruction startConstruction endCommands/Permissions
There are no Commands and no permissions!工业[url=https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/slimedustry]官方[/url][url=https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/slimedustry/files/latest]官方下载[/url]SlimedustryThe project is now inactive, due to lack of time, I might continue it later onIntroductionJust installed the Slimefun plugin, wanted more Industry? Then this plugin is made for you! Featuring Nukes, Mining Lasers and Mass Fabricators, this plugin will certainly fit your Industrial needs, with new updates regularly and a ton of ideas. Try it now, just install Slimefun and drop the jar in your plugins folder!Features24 new Industrial items15 new Researches4 new CategoriesHarder RecipesAll new Items and Changes can be found hereConfig FileLightweightVery easy to use
Commands/sd reload: reload the config (Slimedustry.reload)/sd charge {PlayerName}: charges the item in the hand of the specified Player (Slimedustry.charge)
ConfigurationMiningLaser:    ExplosionStrength: 4    ##The explosion strength of the Mining Laser (TnT = 4)    MiningCharge: 1    ##The amount of Joule that will be used when you use the Mining Laser on 'Mining' mode    ExplosiveCharge: 5    ##The amount of Joule that will be used when you use the Mining Laser on 'Explosive' mode    SuperHeatCharge: 2    ##The amount of Joule that will be used when you use the Mining Laser on 'Superheat' modeNuke:    ExplosionStrength: 35    ##The explosion strength of the Nuke (TnT = 4)    Delay: 10    ##How long (in seconds) it will take for a Nuke to go offStickyResinDropChance: 20##The 1/X drop chance of Sticky ResinStaticBootsGeneration: 0.01##The amount of Joule that will be generated when walking with Static BootsRockCutterCharge: 5##The amount of Joule that will be used when you use the Rock CutterNanoSuitCharge: 10##The amount of Joule that will be used when the NanoSuit absorbs Damage

CreditsMrCookieSlime for developing SlimefunAlblaka and the IC2 team for developing IndustrialCraft2 (where I got my inspiration)GregoriusT for developing GregTech (where I got some more inspiration)

ContactIf you have questions/bug reports/suggestions, you can submit a ticket here灵魂瓶子[url=https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/slimefun/pages/addons]官方[/url][url=https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/slimefun/files/latest]官方下载[/url]Description

SoulJars is an Addon for the Plugin Slimefun.
It adds Soul Jars to the Game which can be used to capture Mobs inside Jars.
If you get 128 (configurable) Souls you reach a Level 2 Jar which can be used
for crafting a Broken Spawner.
This works like any other Broken Spawner from Slimefun and can be infused to
create a Reinforced Spawner that can actually spawn Mobs.
This Plugin requires Slimefun and CS-CoreLib 

Additionally, if you are using EmeraldEnchants 2, this Plugin adds a new Enchantment called "Soul Cleaver" which makes you get extra Souls.
It also comes with a craftable "Demonic Sword" which is a Stone Sword enchanted with Soul Cleaver.

This is what a Soul Jar looks like by the way
Frequently Asked Questions

Click to go to the FAQ科技矿物[url=https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/slimefunores]官方[/url][url=https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/slimefunores/files/latest]官方下载[/url]Recently, I've noticed that lots of players who have been playing on servers with Slimefun were having trouble getting dusts to make alloys, since using a washer is the only way of getting them. Now with SlimefunOres, you can get dusts by breaking ores!CS-CoreLib and Slimefun must be installed for this plugin to work!By breaking ores you can get:Iron DustGold DustAluminum DustZinc DustTin DustCopper DustMagnesium DustLead DustSilver DustTiny Piles of Uranium (Only available from diamond and emerald ore)
MilestonesThank you for the 1000 Downloads!Thank you for the 5000 Downloads!
Old & New AlgorithmFrom version 1.4, I added a new choosing algorithm because the liast one wasn't completely random. Basically, the old algorithm had an order going on like this (most common on left): Iron Dust > Gold Dust > Aluminum Dust > Copper Dust > Zinc Dust > Tin Dust > Magnesium Dust > Lead Dust > Silver Dust. This means that the iron dust and gold dust would be the most common to get, lead and silver the rarest. The new algorithm is completely random, which means that each dust has an equal chance of getting chosen.You can only get dusts if the ore you break hasn't been placed down and has been naturally generated.Example Configoptions:  auto-update: true //Enable this if you want the plugin to get auto updated.  old-algorithm: false //Enable this if you want to use the old dust choosing algorithm.coal_ore:  overall_chance: 25 //This is the chance in percentage. It means that when you break a block there is a 25% that you will get a dust   gold_dust: true  aluminum_dust: true  zinc_dust: true  tin_dust: true  copper_dust: true  magnesium_dust: true  lead_dust: true  silver_dust: trueiron_ore:  overall_chance: 25  gold_dust: true  aluminum_dust: true  zinc_dust: true  tin_dust: true  copper_dust: true  magnesium_dust: true  lead_dust: true  silver_dust: truegold_ore:  overall_chance: 25  gold_dust: true  aluminum_dust: true  zinc_dust: true  tin_dust: true  copper_dust: true  magnesium_dust: true  lead_dust: true  silver_dust: truediamond_ore:  overall_chance: 25  gold_dust: true  aluminum_dust: true  zinc_dust: true  tin_dust: true  copper_dust: true  magnesium_dust: true  lead_dust: true  silver_dust: true  tiny_uranium: false //Disabled by default.emerald_ore:  overall_chance: 25  gold_dust: true  aluminum_dust: true  zinc_dust: true  tin_dust: true  copper_dust: true  magnesium_dust: true  lead_dust: true  silver_dust: true  tiny_uranium: false //Disabled by default.

This plugin does not have any commands or permissions. The only thing you may want to edit is the config.yml file.Auto-Updater and MetricsAll my Plugins are using an Auto-Updater to make sure, you're always using the latest and hopefully most bug free version of my Plugin. If you don't want this Plugin to be auto-updated, you can turn it off in the config file at "options -> auto-update: true/false"They also use a Metrics-System which collects the following Information:A unique identifierThe server's version of JavaWhether the server is in offline or online modeThe plugin's versionThe server's versionThe OS version/name and architectureThe core count for the CPUThe number of players onlineThe Metrics versionOpting out of this service can be done by editing plugins/Plugin Metrics/config.yml and changing opt-out to true.
科技生物[url=https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/slimemobs]官方[/url][url=https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/slimemobs/files/latest]官方下载[/url]This is a quite simple plugin, it allows you to get slimefun items, by killing mobs!CS-CoreLib and Slimefun must be installed for this plugin to work!Example Configoptions:  auto-update: true //Enable this if you want the plugin to get auto updateddropchance: 15 //This is the chance for a mob to drop a slimefun item in percentageenabledEntities: //These are the mobs which can drop slimefun items  CREEPER: true  SKELETON: true  SPIDER: true  GIANT: true  ZOMBIE: true  SLIME: true  GHAST: true  PIG_ZOMBIE: true  ENDERMAN: true  CAVE_SPIDER: true  SILVERFISH: true  BLAZE: true  MAGMA_CUBE: true  WITHER: true  BAT: true  WITCH: true  ENDERMITE: true  GUARDIAN: true  PIG: true  SHEEP: true  COW: true  CHICKEN: true  SQUID: true  WOLF: true  MUSHROOM_COW: true  SNOWMAN: true  OCELOT: true  IRON_GOLEM: true  HORSE: true  RABBIT: true  VILLAGER: trueitems: //This node contains ALL of the slimefun items, this includes addon items as well. All of the items are enabled by default.  EXAMPLE_ITEM: true //Set this to false if you do NOT want this item to be included in the drops.

Commands & Permissionsbatchset <true|false> - This command allows you to set ALL of the items under the "items" node to false, it can be useful if you want to start with all the items disabled and slowly enable some. Permission: slimemobs.batchset
UsageCopy the plugin into the plugins folder.Start the server and then stop it.Open the config.yml file inside SlimeMobs.Tweak any settings you want to.THIS IS RECOMMENDED TO DOSave & Start the server.Have fun!
Please note that the mobs will drop items if that mob is not a baby, and the dropped item will be an item that the killer has unlocked.Auto-Updater and MetricsAll my Plugins are using an Auto-Updater to make sure, you're always using the latest and hopefully most bug free version of my Plugin. This plugin adds in 2 items to the game, Soul Shard and the Soul Cage. The Soul Shard allows you to start capturing the souls of any monster/animal, you can then get the shard better and better by killing more of the bound mob. The shard has 5 tiers each one makes it react differently when spawning entities. Stats of the souls are below. To make the shard actually spawn the mobs you would need to put the shard into the soul cage.You can also find this plugin on PlanetMinecraft.
